column4: hello. you've lost your recommended resolution? i'm curious, what caused this to happen?

i don't know.  i logged on today, and the resolution was off.  everything bigger than normal.  so i went to settings manager, then display.  my resolution was set to something other than the recommended one.  the recommended value was not in the list.
I wish there was some steps i could recreate, but the only step was turning on the machine
show me what driver you are using..   grep drivers /var/log/Xorg.0.log
